org.kde.welcomecenter.desktop CC0-1.0 GPL-2.0+ Welcome Center Friendly onboarding wizard for Plasma
Welcome Center is the prefect introduction to KDE Plasma! It will help you learn how to connect to the internet, install apps, customize the system, and more! https://bugs.kde.org/enter_bug.cgi?product=Welcome%20Center https://bugs.kde.org/enter_bug.cgi?product=Welcome%20Center
